channel.title: Comments on: Help applying to Seedcamp continued

item.description: [...] I explain the value? - Tell me about my bad spellings/punctuation. I hope my draft is of use to the guys meeting in Oriel House to work on theirs on August 7th. My only word of warning, this took me about 16 hours to get this [...]

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description:
Unfortunately the closing date for doing video pitches is Wednesday but hopefully that won't stop people giving the webcam a go.
Robin Blandford of Decisions for Heroes <a href="http://blog.seedcamp.com/2008/07/quick-pitch-round-table.html#comment-1072433" rel="nofollow">already has</a>.
item.content:encoded:
Unfortunately the closing date for doing video pitches is Wednesday but hopefully that won’t stop people giving the webcam a go.

Robin Blandford of Decisions for Heroes already has.
